description: Complete system overview documenting the task management system's architecture, key components, and interaction patterns between AI providers and task orchestration
Detailed documentation of the task data models including status flows, dependency relationships, tag management, and hierarchical task structures with parent-child relationships
Technical documentation of AI provider integration including the provider registry system, model-specific adaptations, response handling, and failover mechanisms
Detailed documentation of the AI-driven task complexity analysis algorithms, scoring system, and task breakdown logic based on complexity thresholds
Documentation of the dependency resolution system including circular dependency detection, dependency chain validation, and automated progression logic
